mapper.select: SELECT * FROM allowance_items ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO allowance_items (name, fixed_amount, is_fixed, is_tax_free, tax_free_type, tax_free_limit, is_active) VALUES (#{name}, #{fixed_amount}, #{is_fixed}, #{is_tax_free}, #{tax_free_type}, #{tax_free_limit}, #{is_active})
mapper.update: UPDATE allowance_items SET name = #{name}, fixed_amount = #{fixed_amount}, is_fixed = #{is_fixed}, is_tax_free = #{is_tax_free}, tax_free_type = #{tax_free_type}, tax_free_limit = #{tax_free_limit}, is_active = #{is_active} WHERE id = #{id}
